snippet: Concerns about the future protection of the sage grouse may have scared off bidders for all but one of 97 oil and gas leases in Nevada.
abstract: Concerns about future protection of sage grouse may have scared off bidders for all but one of 97 oil and gas leases in Nevada; auction by federal Bureau of Land Management was subject of rally by two dozen anti-fracking protesters.
lead_paragraph: Concerns about the future protection of the sage grouse may have scared off bidders for all but one of 97 oil and gas leases in Nevada.

headline.main: Fears of Bird Protection Rules Scare Off Energy Lease Bidders
headline.print_headline: Fears of Bird Protection Rules Scare Off Energy Lease Bidders
